short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to add notes to LinkedIn profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinknTrack – Your Personalized LinkedIn Assistant

LinknTrack is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you manage and enhance your LinkedIn connections. Effortlessly add private, personalized notes 📝 to LinkedIn profiles and keep track of important details about your network. Whether you're a professional looking to stay organized, a business developer, or someone looking to build stronger relationships, LinknTrack is your go-to tool for remembering key insights and staying on top of your connections 📅

- Add private notes to LinkedIn profiles for future reference 💡
- Notes are saved and synced automatically 🔄, so you can access them anywhere 🌍
- Customizable and secure 🔐 – all your notes are stored safely
- Stay organized with easy-to-use features that seamlessly integrate into LinkedIn 💼

Our goal is to empower you to effortlessly track, remember, and grow your connections through personalized notes 💪

How to Get Started:

- Install LinknTrack from the Chrome Web Store.
- Log in to access the service.
- Start adding notes to LinkedIn profiles and enjoy seamless integration.
- Access your notes anytime on LinkedIn profiles – no need to remember everything!

Note: We’re continuously working on improving LinknTrack based on your feedback. Your suggestions help us make the extension better! 🚀 Please send feedback to team@linkntrack.com or on X/Twitter to:
- Mariem: https://x.com/_MariemEhab
- Julien: https://x.com/julienbarbier42
